titles.title: To amend the International Air Transportation Competition Act of 1979 to eliminate restrictions on the provision of air transportation to and from Love Field, Texas.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 2/11/1999--Introduced. Amends the International Air Transportation Competition Act of 1979 to repeal the prohibition against air carrier service (except certain kinds of charter, commuter, and other specified air service) between Love Field, Texas, and destinations outside the State of Texas or its four surrounding States.
